line_1: By an unfriendly and unjust Surmize;
line_2: Destroy not thus your gen'rous Courtesies
Consists in lawless pow'r! to deem them wife

line_1: By the dread vision, at the mere surmise
line_2: The thronging Spirits, as in tumult, rise,

line_1: A mixture breed of strange surmize,
line_2: Of doubt, of pleasure, and surprize!

line_1: His troublous thoughts, and clear'd each sad surmise;
line_2: Up to his sire he rais'd in mournful wise;

line_1: His troublous thoughts, and clear'd each sad surmise;
line_2: Then turns his ready steed, and on his journey hies.
